title: is there other reason when cuda out of memory ?
body_html:
when running my invert code of from right and executable tensorflow code by the same GPU xp environment , the error is below:

RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (2) : out of memory at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1501969512886/work/pytorch-0.1.12/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu:66

meanwhile

the GPU memory was out of when the code ran the third conv3d . but the net is ok in tensorflow.

body:
when running my invert  code of from right and executable tensorflow code by the same GPU xp environment , the error is below:

RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (2) : out of memory at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1501969512886/work/pytorch-0.1.12/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu:66

meanwhile

the GPU memory  was out of when the code ran the third conv3d . but the net is ok in tensorflow.
